abstract: There are plenty of reasons couples avoid talking about money. And they are all bad.
snippet: There are plenty of reasons couples avoid talking about money. And they are all bad.
lead_paragraph: Carl Richards is a certified financial planner in Park City, Utah. His sketches are archived here on the Bucks blog and on his personal Web site, BehaviorGap.com.

headline.main: Your Financial Honeymoon Will Eventually End
